    Papers

    1. Non-unique self-similar blowups in Sabra models:
      insights from dynamical systems and machine-learning,
      with Campolina and Simonnet
      arXiv

    2. From zero-mode intermittency to hidden symmetry
      in random scalar advection, with Mailybaev,
      J. Stat. Phys. 2024,  arXiv

    3. Spontaneous stochasticity in the presence of intermittency
      with Considera,
      PRL 2023,  arXiv

    4. Anomalous dissipation and spontaneous stochasticity
      in deterministic surface quasi-geostrophic flow
      with Valade & Bec,
      Annales Henri Poincaré 2023,  arXiv, YouTube

    5. Hidden scale invariance in Navier-Stokes intermittency,
      with Mailybaev,
      PTRS 2022,  arXiv,  YouTube

    6. Inverse cascade anomalies in fourth-order Leith Models,
      with Medvedev, Grebenev & Nazarenko,
      JPA 2021,  arXiv

    7. From the butterfly effect to intrinsic randomness in singular shear flows,
      with Bec & Mailybaev
      Comm. Phys. 2020,  arXiv
      Impa’s press release

    8. Turbulence of generalised flows in two dimensions,
      with Bec,
      JFM 2019,  arXiv

    9. Phase transition in time-reversible Navier-Stokes equations
      with Shukla, Dubrulle, Nazarenko & Krstulovic,
      PRE 2019,  arXiV

    10. Nonlinear diffusion models for gravitational wave turbulence,
      with Galtier, Nazarenko & Buchlin,
      Physica D 2019,  arXiV

    11. Turbulent mass inhomogeneities induced by a point-source,
      J.Stat. Mech. 2018,  arXiV

    12. Optimal response to non-equilibrium disturbances under truncated Burgers–Hopf dynamics,
      with Turkington,
      J. Phys. A 2017,  arXiV

    13. Optimal thermalization in a shell model of homogeneous turbulence,
      with Turkington,
      J. Phys. A 2016,  arXiV

    14. Coarse-graining two-dimensional turbulence via dynamical optimization,
      with Turkington & Chen,
      Nonlinearity 2016,  arXiV

    15. Anomalous spectral laws in differential models of turbulence
      with Nazarenko, Galtier & Medvedev,
      J. Phys. A 2015,  arXiV

    16. A statistical mechanics framework for the large-scale structure of turbulent Von Kármán flows,
      with Saint-Michel, Herbert, Daviaud & Dubrulle,
      NJP 2015,  arXiV

    17. Cross-helicity in rotating homogeneous shear-stratified turbulence,
      with Pieri, Godeferd, Cambon & Dubrulle
      PRL 2014,  HAL

    18. Statistical mechanics of the 3D axisymmetric Euler equations in a Taylor–Couette geometry
      with Dubrulle & Bouchet
      J. Stat. Mech. 2014,  arXiV

    19. Turbulent pair dispersion as a continuous-time random walk
      with Krstulovic & Bec
      JFM 2014,  arXiV

    20. Rotating helical turbulence: three-dimensionalization or self-similarity in the small scales ?
      with Pouquet, Baerenzung, Mininni & Rosenberg
      Journal of Physics: Conference Series 2011

    21. Conformal invariance in three-dimensional rotating turbulence
      with Rosenberg, Pouquet & Mininni
      PRL 2011,   arXiV

    22. Statistical mechanics of Beltrami flows in axisymmetric geometry: equilibria and bifurcations,
      with Naso, Collette, Chavanis & Dubrulle,
      J. Stat. Mech. 2010,  arXiV
